title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: The current behavior does not have a user interface (UI) to define the default line delimiters for new files in Eclipse.
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product. There should be a UI (Preferences) to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values should include Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. The UI should be provided by the Workbench since all plugins should use the same line delimiter for new files.
SR: To reproduce the issue, consider the following scenario: Use both Unix and Windows work stations to develop a Unix product/program in Eclipse.
